functions.name: shortLabelFromUri
functions.description: Derive a short human-readable label from a URI, prefixed name, or short label. Handles http(s) URIs by returning the last path/fragment segment, prefixed names by returning the segment after the colon, and falls back to splitting on '#' or '/'.

functions.name: EntityAutocomplete (component)
functions.signature: const EntityAutocomplete = ({ entities, value, onValueChange, placeholder?, emptyMessage?, className?, disabled?, filterByType? }: EntityAutocompleteProps) => JSX.Element
functions.description: Popover-backed entity selector tailored for ontology entities. Filters entities by optional RDF type and by label/IRI/namespace/description matching the user's input, limits results to top 5, and renders a Command-style list. On select, calls onValueChange with the entity IRI. Displays a concise label for the selected value using shortLabelFromUri when no exact entity is loaded.

notes: Component is lightweight, shows namespace + label + rdfType in the item subtitle, and uses a small client-side filter with a 5-item result cap for UX performance.
